original_text: The sound of the wings of the cherubim could be heard as far away as the outer court, like the voice of God Almighty when he speaks.
korean_text: 그룹들의 날개 소리는 바깥뜰까지 들리는데 전능하신 하나님이 말씀하시는 음성 같더라

sentences.original_text: The sound of the wings of the cherubim
could be heard as far away as the outer court
like the voice of God Almighty
